soroban.title: What is Soroban?
soroban.desc: Soroban is the Japanese abacus with over 400 years of history. Kids learning Soroban can visualize the abacus in their mind and calculate as fast as a calculator without pen and paper.
soroban.benefit1Desc: Activates both left brain (logic) and right brain (visual)
soroban.benefit2Desc: Add/subtract 2-3 digit numbers in seconds, no pen needed
soroban.benefit3Desc: Pay attention to each step, applies to all subjects
soroban.benefit4Desc: Popular in Japan, Korea, China, Malaysia...
